heat_capacity¶

class thermosteam.functors.heat_capacity.Lastovka_Shaw(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Create a functor of temperature (T; in K) that calcuates gas molar heat capacity (Cn.g; in J/mol/K) using the Lastovka Shaw equation.

Parameters
MWfloat

Molecular weight [g/mol].

similarity_variable, iscyclic_aliphaticfloat

Regressed coefficients.
